snippet: The Yankees and the Tampa Sports Authority announced plans for a $40 million improvement project at the team’s spring home.
abstract: Tampa Sports Authority and New York Yankees announce $40 million renovation project of Steinbrenner Field, to be paid for equally by State of Florida, Hillsborough County and team.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees and the Tampa Sports Authority announced plans for a $40 million improvement project at the team’s spring home.

headline.main: Yankees Set to Spruce Up Steinbrenner Field
headline.print_headline: Yankees Set to Spruce Up Spring Home
